reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: Cute game! Add more enchanted blocks like toads, witch hats, black cats and cauldrons for a perfect score!

reviews.title: very fun game and very addicting
reviews.comment: Like Swedish Cherry Pie on a warm Canada Sunday morning.

reviews.title: Its pretty fun

reviews.title: Good Game. Fun fun fun
reviews.comment: Keep playing

reviews.title: So much fun :D
reviews.comment: You will love this match 3 game. I can play this for hours!

reviews.title: Me likey
reviews.comment: Very fun and entertaining! :)
reviews.author: estefania alarcon

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Com2us games are the best! My only problem in this is that I often get DC even if I have excellent connection. Other than that, this game is a bomb!
reviews.author: Andrea Aguas

reviews.title: Fadt & furious
reviews.comment: Fast phased great game
reviews.author: Sherdon Go

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I\'d recommend this to anyone who likes a fast paced puzzle game with a magical twist. Kind of like bejeweled mixed with Street fighter
reviews.author: Ashley Smith

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I love this game it brings the best out of me and makes me try harder I love it so much
reviews.author: Ashtin Peddicord

reviews.comment: Really good game easy to play and the leveling up is great would prefer the ability to customize your own character but that\'s just me
reviews.author: Armando Cordova

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a pretty good game, the style and animations are amazing, I just don\'t like one thing in particular, but overall its a good game.
reviews.author: Jasmine Esquivel

reviews.title: Annoying.
reviews.comment: Keeps disconnecting and is extremely buggy. Don get this until fully functional.
reviews.author: Vira Starr Cucal

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Very fun and challenging but in a way that makes you want to get better and learn new tactics. I wish it was a bit easier to get other characters, but it\'s a good incentive to keep playing.
reviews.author: Ashley Kenyon

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: Very fun game no defects so far over all a cool fun game
reviews.author: Roger Lemaster

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Extremely addicting. I find trouble setting it down. And Its really neat that you can battle others.
reviews.author: Barbara Cong

reviews.title: Well balance
reviews.comment: Its a good well balanced game, it need data connection to play. Suggestions, please create an offline type like tower defense.
reviews.author: gregory wenas
